description:
Chit finds a white fluffy ball in front of Sugao’s house and assumes it’s Yeti, but it’s a ball of little Yetis!
The little fur balls may be cute but they’re causing chaos in Sugao’s house.
Meanwhile, Goma-chan has quickly become good friends with the frog and Ashibe even names it Hirao.
But does Goma-chan have an ulterior motive to this new friendship?
Source: crunchyroll
